name: The Kamikaze
description:
Fight and die with honor! Kill as many Allied planes for as long as you can survive in the skies! Make your death count!

DOWNLOAD HERE

__________________________________

CONTROLS:

W - Accelerate Plane
S - Decelerate Plane
LMB - Fire Weapon
Escape/P - Pause Game

__________________________________

Created during the 2019 Summer UE4 Jam!
